RTâ€‚WINTÎžR ðŸ’™ðŸ’› forge inspect $CONTRACT ir-optimized ðŸ¤¯ Blows my mind (aka "radically upgrades my capabilities") It takes Solidity code and shows the optimized Yul assembly. Unlike the raw bytecode, it's much easier to read and understand. Let me tell you why I think it's amazing â†“
0age:â€‚There's a well-known phenomenon in software development: often, you'll "plateau" for a while before discovering a new trick, tool, or workflow that radically upgrades your capabilities Recently discovered one such trick & want to share with my fellow smart contract optimizors ðŸ‘‡
